item.title: Dissecting Go Binaries
item.description: This post will introduce you to the basic concepts of disassembly and walk through writing a simple disassembler in Go. The goal is to make the whole concept of disassembly as accessible as possible and hopefully give you, the reader, a takeaway or two about how compiled Go binaries work. Assembly code cannot lie. By reading assembly we become as close as possible to knowing whatâ€™s being run on our computer chips.
